title: Find the number of pair with sum less than a number in an array
input: an array containing integers, number x
output: how many pairs in that array sum up to less than x
solution: Sort it if it's not already sorted. have l and r pointer. while l < r: if sum arr[l] + arr[r] < x it means that all pair from l, [l+1:r] are smaller than x. Then add to result (r-l) then increment l. Else (sum arr[l] + arr[r] > x) decrement r
runtime: O(NlogN) if need to sort array else O(N)
note: A harder version is find triplet.
